Nybba wins!
All Provinces are gone.

cards in supply: Chapel, Conspirator, Contraband, Expand, Farmland, Great Hall, King's Court, Navigator, Silk Road, and Upgrade
Default card selection was used.  The point tracker will be available.
----------------------

#1 Nybba: 39 points (5 Provinces, 5 Great Halls, a Duchy, and an Estate); 16 turns
       opening: Chapel / Conspirator
       [18 cards] 5 Great Halls, 2 Conspirators, 1 Expand, 1 King's Court, 1 Silver, 1 Gold, 1 Estate, 1 Duchy, 5 Provinces

#2 cyncat: 24 points (2 Provinces, 2 Silk Roads [10 victory cards], a Duchy, 3 Great Halls, and 2 Estates); 16 turns
        opening: Great Hall / Conspirator
        [25 cards] 3 Great Halls, 2 King's Courts, 2 Silk Roads, 2 Upgrades, 1 Conspirator, 1 Contraband, 1 Expand, 1 Navigator, 6 Coppers, 1 Silver, 2 Estates, 1 Duchy, 2 Provinces

----------------------

trash: a Farmland, a Chapel, a Province, a Duchy, 6 Estates, a Silver, a Conspirator, 4 Upgrades, and 11 Coppers

Nybba wins!
